content: garter stitch dishcloth you ll love this traditional garter stitch dishcloth for its ridged scrubbing power and its thick texture it is easy to make every row is knitted and every row has one yarn over increase near the beginning in the last half of the dishcloth two decreases are worked on each row joan inglis janes © 2011-2019 joaninglisjanes@gmail com abbreviations instructions increase - increase in this case a yarn over cast on 4 sts k - knit knit one row k2tog - knit two stitches together a decrease increase row k2 yo knit across st s - stitch es repeat increase row until there are 40 sts on yo - yarn over bring yarn forward needle for a larger cloth work the increase between needles and then over the needle row until there are 43-48 stitches on the towards the back to be ready to knit next needle - knitter s choice stitch in the diagram below the increase row make up the bottom half of the dishcloth materials 4 5 mm needles one ball unmercerized cotton yarn such as lily decrease row k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit sugar n cream across gauge 20 sts over 10 cm or 5 stitches per repeat this row until there are 4 sts on nee- inch in garter stitch dle in the diagram below the decrease row make up the top half of the dishcloth cast off weave in ends cast off cast on edge cast on joan inglis janes © 2011-2019 joaninglisjanes@gmail com 2
